comp

Class ExtendedList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<T>
          • comp.ExtendedList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the objects contained in the list
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.util.Collection<T>, java.util.List<T>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class ExtendedList<T>
extends java.util.ArrayList<T>
    This class extends ArrayList to provide additional useful functionalities.
    Author:
    ElijahMas
    See Also:

        public T getFrom(T source,
                 int distanceFrom)
        Given an object source and a distance d, return the object in the list that is distance d from source.
        Parameters:
        source - object of type T
        distanceFrom - int value, can be of any sign
        Returns:

      • getDistanceFromToMod

        public int getDistanceFromToMod(T from,
                                T to)
        Get the distance from T from to T to in this list, if both are present, modulated by the list's size.
        Parameters:
        from - object of type T
        to - object of type T
        Returns:
        {@link Math.floormod}({@link #indexOf(Object) indexOf}(to) - {@link #indexOf(Object) indexOf}(from), {@link #size()}

      • modSize

        private int modSize(int v)
        Modulate a quantity by the list's size. Convenience method for internal use only.
        Parameters:
        v - any integer
        Returns:
        v%ArrayList.size()
